policy_text: The prices on the website are stated in dinars including tax, and payment is made exclusively in dinars. Delivery is made ONLY on the territory of the Republic of Serbia.
policy_text2: We strive to be as precise as possible in product description, image display and prices themselves, but we cannot guarantee that all information is complete and without errors. All items displayed on the site are part of our offer and not it is understood that they are available at all times. Availability of goods you can check by calling the Call Center at +381 11 4122 949 (at the price of a local call).
